# category

**Instance Property**

The category of the activity.

## Declaration

```swift
var category: ActivityCategory
```

## Discussion

The category’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ManagedSettings/ActivityCategory/localizedDisplayName] will be available to your device activity report extension.
title: category
